About Me

Hey there, I'm Tanaka Mawere. I am a 4th year medical student, programmer, musician (not too sure about this one), blogger and trader. (I am a fitness addict on rare occassions)

Programming

Started with Python (like everyone else), moved to Java for Android and settled on C# and .NET for everything

Music

I play the keyboard and bass. I then pretend to know what I am doing on the drums, acoustic guitar, marimba and in singing.

Medicine

I sometimes wonder what I am doing here but I am already 4 years into it. Why not just finish it?

Trading

Nasdaq and Xauusd are the only two things I look at. They give me a bit of pocket money. Certainly not a lambo driving, money flaunting idiot (yet)
